name: Windranger
title: Lyralei
lore: Orphaned by war, Lyralei found kinship with the wind and became its living embodiment.

shackleshot.name: Shackleshot
shackleshot.description: Fires a shackle that latches enemies to trees or each other, stunning them.

powershot.name: Powershot
powershot.description: Channels to charge an arrow that damages enemies in a line.

windrun.name: Windrun
windrun.description: Windranger runs with the wind, gaining evasion and bonus movement speed.

focusFire.name: Focus Fire
focusFire.description: Windranger channels the wind to attack a single target with maximum attack speed.

25: Focus Fire Kills Reset Focus Fire
